trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESNYRFSTSHOGUN2014_00145_YELLOWGENERAL_000_000<tab>Why does she speak that way, you ask? An astute question, at last. The uma bugyo is a lady of a house most noble, and it is the high speech of the Far East that you note with pleasing keenness.
TEXT_FESNYRFSTSHOGUN2014_00145_YELLOWGENERAL_000_001<tab>She is high-minded as well as gently spoken, and this labor is one that she freely undertook over considerable...skepticism in some circles.

TEXT_FESNYRFSTSHOGUN2014_00145_YELLOWGENERAL_000_010<tab>Your head is bare, adventurer. Do I have another uma kabuto, you ask? There was meant to be but one, a proof of <var 08 E905 ((m'lady's)) ((m'lord's)) /var> success in Gridania.
TEXT_FESNYRFSTSHOGUN2014_00145_YELLOWGENERAL_000_011<tab>How vexing. I have no choice but to grant you another, but...how vexing.
